column5: Olivette was built in 1887 and is a comfortable cottage with a maximum capacity of 5 people. It is mid-town; just a short drive to The Strand and/or the beach. Or, you could just stay at Olivette! There is a front porch with four big rocking chairs, perfect for morning coffee or evening drinks. A swimming pool in the fenced back yard is a great place to relax either by yourself or with friends.  Across from the historic Menard House, and blocks from Kempner Park
